DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Curie mIBG score assigned to the lower legs segment to indicate the quantity of metastases, as defined by the sponsor.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A findings domain that represents quantitative measurements and/or qualitative assessments of the tumors identified in the TU domain.

Property.preferredName: Lower Leg Curie Extension Score Tumor Results Original Result

Concepts.definition: The portion of the lower extremity between the knee and the ankle. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole inferior limb.
A score assigned to a Curie body segment to indicate the quantity of metastases.
The outcome of the tumor results assessment as originally received or collected.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Tumor Results Original Result Clinical Study Sponsor Defined Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The outcome of the tumor results assessment as originally received or collected._An entity such as an individual, company, institution, group, or organization which takes responsibility for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical study. The sponsor does not actually conduct the investigation unless the sponsor is a sponsor-investigator. A person other than an individual (e.g., corporation or agency) that uses one or more of its own employees to conduct research it has initiated is considered to be a sponsor, and the employees are considered to be investigators. [21 CFR P.50.3(k)] [21 CFR P.50.102(j)] [21 CFR P.312.3]_Clearly characterized or delimited._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Diffuse involvement within a segment (>50% of the segment).

Concepts.definition: Diffuse involvement within a segment (>50% of the segment).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: More than one metastatic site within a segment.

Concepts.definition: More than one metastatic site within a segment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One metastatic site within a segment.

Concepts.definition: One metastatic site within a segment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No metastatic sites within a segment.

Concepts.definition: No metastatic sites within a segment.

Concepts.definition: The outcome of the tumor results assessment as originally received or collected.

An entity such as an individual, company, institution, group, or organization which takes responsibility for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical study. The sponsor does not actually conduct the investigation unless the sponsor is a sponsor-investigator. A person other than an individual (e.g., corporation or agency) that uses one or more of its own employees to conduct research it has initiated is considered to be a sponsor, and the employees are considered to be investigators. [21 CFR P.50.3(k)] [21 CFR P.50.102(j)] [21 CFR P.312.3]
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
